ModuleDescription: This module focuses on the real estate marketing processes as well as specific real estate marketing strategies and practices that are applicable to various types of real estate, including residential, commercial and industrial institutional and heritage developments. Its scope encompasses the various real estate marketing methods/practices in Singapore, the HDB Act as well as the use of internet marketing tools. Case studies in Singapore and overseas will be utilised as an additional teaching tool to enhance studentsâ€™ learning of how to market public and private sector real estate developments for sale and lease under both boom and recessionary market conditions.
Prerequisite: RE2106 Real Estate Marketing and Negotiation
